verses.verse: Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> the space of fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I went up <S%G305><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>, taking <S%G4838><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with me <S%G4838><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I went up <S%G305><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> I laid <S%G394><s%> before them <S%G846><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I preach <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G2596><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> privately <S%G2398><s%> before them who <S%G3588><s%> were of repute <S%G1380><s%>, lest by any means <S%G3381><s%> I should be running <S%G5143><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> had run <S%G5143><s%>, in <S%G1519><s%> vain <S%G2756><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> not even <S%G3761><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> who was <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> a Greek <S%G1672><s%>, was compelled <S%G315><s%> to be circumcised <S%G4059><s%>:

and that <S%G1161><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> the false brethren <S%G5569><s%> privily brought in <S%G3920><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> came in privily <S%G3922><s%> to spy out <S%G2684><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they might bring <S%G2615><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> into bondage <S%G2615><s%>:

to whom <S%G3739><s%> we gave place <S%G1502><s%> in the way of subjection <S%G5292><s%>, no <S%G3761><s%>, not for <S%G4314><s%> an hour <S%G5610><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> might continue <S%G1265><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> were <S%G1380><s%> reputed to be <S%G1511><s%> somewhat <S%G5100><s%> (whatsoever3697, 4218 they were <S%G2258><s%>, it maketh <S%G1308><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> matter <S%G1308><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>: God <S%G2316><s%> accepteth <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%>'s person <S%G4383><s%>) <S%G1063><s%> â€”they, I say <S%G3588><s%>, who were <S%G1380><s%> of repute imparted <S%G4323><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> contrariwise <S%G5121><s%>, when they saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I had been intrusted <S%G4100><s%> with the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> with the gospel of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> wrought <S%G1754><s%> for Peter <S%G4074><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the apostleship <S%G651><s%> of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> wrought <S%G1754><s%> for me <S%G1698><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>);

and <S%G2532><s%> when they perceived <S%G1097><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, James <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%>, they who <S%G3588><s%> were reputed <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> pillars <S%G4769><s%>, gave <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> the right hands <S%G1188><s%> of fellowship <S%G2842><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> should go unto <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>;

only <S%G3440><s%> they would that <S%G2443><s%> we should remember <S%G3421><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%>; which <S%G3739><s%> very <S%G846><s%> thing <S%G5124><s%> I was also <S%G2532><s%> zealous <S%G4704><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Cephas <S%G4074><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, I resisted <S%G436><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2596><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he stood <S%G2258><s%> condemned <S%G2607><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> James <S%G2385><s%>, he ate <S%G4906><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%>, he drew back <S%G5288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, fearing <S%G5399><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> were of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> dissembled <S%G4942><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> with him <S%G846><s%>; insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> was carried away with <S%G4879><s%> their <S%G846><s%> dissimulation <S%G5272><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they walked <S%G3716><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> uprightly <S%G3716><s%> according to <S%G4314><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, I said <S%G2036><s%> unto Cephas <S%G4074><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, livest <S%G2198><s%> as do the Gentiles <S%G1483><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as do the Jews <S%G2452><s%>, how <S%G5101><s%> compellest thou <S%G315><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to live as do the Jews <S%G2450><s%>?
We <S%G2249><s%> being Jews <S%G2453><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>,

yet knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G1344><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> but1437, 3361 through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we might be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>: because by <S%G1360><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> shall <S%G1344><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be justified <S%G1344><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%>, while we sought <S%G2212><s%> to be justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, we ourselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were found <S%G2147><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, is <S%G687><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%> of sin <S%G3361><s%>? God forbid <S%G1096><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I build <S%G3618><s%> up again <S%G3825><s%> those things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I destroyed <S%G2647><s%>, I prove <S%G4921><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> a transgressor <S%G3848><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> died <S%G599><s%> unto the law <S%G3551><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might live <S%G2198><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.

I have been crucified with <S%G4957><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> it is no <S%G3765><s%> longer I <S%G1473><s%> that live <S%G2198><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> that life which <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2198><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> I live <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, the faith which is in the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> up for <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

I do <S%G114><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> make void <S%G114><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, then <S%G686><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for nought <S%G1432><s%>.
